short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hear a nice applause every time you send an email in Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sending emails is hard sometimes. I get it. With this Chrome extension, you can get an encouraging round of applause whenever you manage to stave off the dread long enough to send one.
